languages.text: {n}Невольники, над которыми была проведена процедура мозгового иссечения, утратили тягу к насилию и подстрекательству, найдя тихое удовольствие в монотонной работе и отсутствии общения с окружающими. Надзиратели отметили, что опыт был в высшей степени успешен.{/n}

{n}The convicts who had their brains dissected have lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The overseers noted that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Невольники, над которыми была проведена процедура мозгового иссечения, утратили тягу к насилию и подстрекательству, найдя тихое удовольствие в монотонной работе и отсутствии общения с окружающими. Надзиратели отметили, что опыт был в высшей степени успешен.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The slaves who have had their brains dissected have lost their urge to cause violence and incite others, and now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and the lack of communication with other people. The officers noted that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

{n}The slaves who have had their brains dissected have lost their urge to cause violence and incite others, and now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and the lack of communication with other people. The officers noted that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

{n}The convicts who had their brains dissected have lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The overseers noted that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那些奴隶的大脑被解剖，之后失去了所有制造暴力与挑衅他人的冲动。如今，他们在单调的工作与独处之中找到了安静的乐趣。所有官员都注意到，这样的实验取得了极大成功。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slaves who had their brains dissected have lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The officers noted that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那些奴隶的大脑被解剖，之后失去了所有制造暴力与挑衅他人的冲动。如今，他们在单调的工作与独处之中找到了安静的乐趣。所有官员都注意到，这样的实验取得了极大成功。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los esclavos a los que se les ha diseccionado el cerebro han perdido todo impulso de causar violencia y provocar a los demás. Ahora encuentran un tranquilo placer en el trabajo monótono y en la falta de comunicación con otras personas. Los oficiales observaron que el experimento ha tenido mucho éxito.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slaves who had their brains dissected have lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The officers noted that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los esclavos a los que se les ha diseccionado el cerebro han perdido todo impulso de causar violencia y provocar a los demás. Ahora encuentran un tranquilo placer en el trabajo monótono y en la falta de comunicación con otras personas. Los oficiales observaron que el experimento ha tenido mucho éxito.{/n}

languages.text: {n}脳を分析された奴隷たちは、暴力を振るったり他人を挑発したりする衝動が起こらなくなった。今では、彼らは単調な仕事や他人とのコミュニケーションを取らずに済むことを喜んでいる。士官らは、この実験を大成功を収めた事例として注目した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slaves who had their brains dissected have lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The officers noted that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}脳を分析された奴隷たちは、暴力を振るったり他人を挑発したりする衝動が起こらなくなった。今では、彼らは単調な仕事や他人とのコミュニケーションを取らずに済むことを喜んでいる。士官らは、この実験を大成功を収めた事例として注目した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les esclaves ayant eu le cerveau disséqué perdent toute velléité de se montrer violents et de provoquer les autres. Désormais, ils trouvent un plaisir tranquille dans un travail monotone et ne communiquent avec personne. D'après les gardiens, l'expérience est un succès retentissant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The slaves who had their brains dissected have lost any urge to cause violence and provoke others. Now they find quiet pleasure in monotonous work and lack of communication with other people. The officers noted that the experiment has been highly successful.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les esclaves ayant eu le cerveau disséqué perdent toute velléité de se montrer violents et de provoquer les autres. Désormais, ils trouvent un plaisir tranquille dans un travail monotone et ne communiquent avec personne. D'après les gardiens, l'expérience est un succès retentissant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Sklaven, deren Gehirne seziert wurden, haben jedes Verlangen verloren, Gewalt auszuüben und andere zu provozieren. Sie finden nun ruhiges Vergnügen in monotoner Arbeit und der Vermeidung jeder Kommunikation mit anderen. Die Offiziere hielten im Protokoll fest, dass das Experiment äußerst erfolgreich gewesen war.{/n}
